data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kawada, Ricardo (2011): Pictorial key for females of Decevania Huben (Hymenoptera, Evaniidae) and description of a new species. ZooKeys 116: 59-84, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.116.1473, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.116.1473
